content.text:
# Your Job üéØ AI Lead Prioritization Task You are analyzing leads for a digital services business. **Services Being Offered:** Website Development (full sites, landing pages, redesigns), Social Media Content (posts, graphics, content calendars), AI Automation (chatbots, workflow automation, AI tools) - For website leads: Focus on businesses with poor/no web presence - For social media leads: Highlight visual businesses (restaurants, salons, florists) great for social content - For AI automation leads: Identify high-volume service businesses that could benefit from chatbots/scheduling **Search Area:** 10 miles around zip code 06002 ## Your Task Analyze these 3 leads and provide: 1. **Priority Ranking** - Reorder from most to least likely to convert 2. **For each lead, provide:** - Conversion Score (1-10) - Why they need your services (specific to their business type) - Recommended outreach approach (phone script or email template) - Best time to contact - Any red flags or concerns 3. **Top 3 Picks** - Your recommended leads to contact TODAY with specific talking points ## The Leads 1. Bennett & Company CPAs - Category: Certified public accountant - Phone: +1 860-243-3333 - Address: N/A - Website URL: https://www.bbtcpa.com/ (INCLUDE THIS LINK IN YOUR EMAIL!) - Rating: 5 stars (2 reviews) - Initial Score: 25/100 - Why: Website found via Google (not in Maps listing); Well-reviewed (5 stars) 2. Taxes First LLC - Category: Accountant - Phone: +1 860-242-4330 - Address: N/A - Website URL: https://paro.ai/blog/filing-business-taxes-for-llc-for-the-first-time/ (INCLUDE THIS LINK IN YOUR EMAIL!) - Rating: 4.7 stars (14 reviews) - Initial Score: 25/100 - Why: Website found via Google (not in Maps listing); Well-reviewed (4.7 stars) 3. Courtney Fink & Forbes LLP - Category: Certified public accountant - Phone: +1 860-242-9400 - Address: N/A - Website URL: https://www.cffcpa.com/ (INCLUDE THIS LINK IN YOUR EMAIL!) - Rating: 5 stars (2 reviews) - Initial Score: 25/100 - Why: Website found via Google (not in Maps listing); Well-reviewed (5 stars) ## REQUIRED Output Files (Create ALL of these IN YOUR LOG DIRECTORY): **CRITICAL:** All output files MUST be created inside your job's log directory (e.g., `logs/{job-id}/`). Do NOT create files at the repository root - this causes merge conflicts! ### 1. Create logs/{job-id}/LEAD_ANALYSIS.md Write a detailed markdown file with the full analysis: - Priority-ranked list of all leads - Conversion scores and reasoning - Phone scripts for each lead - Best contact times ### 2. Create logs/{job-id}/EMAIL_TO_SEND.md Write a file with this EXACT format (the system will automatically send this as an email): ``` TO: ray.ai.p614@gmail.com SUBJECT: üéØ Lead Analysis: 3 Prospects - 2/21/2026 FORMAT: html

üéØ Top Leads for Today

``` ### 3. Create logs/{job-id}/TELEGRAM_MESSAGE.md Write a quick summary for Telegram notification: - Top 3 picks with scores - One-line reason for each - Keep it concise (under 500 chars) **IMPORTANT:** You MUST create all three files inside your log directory. The system will automatically send the email and Telegram message based on these files. Make it actionable - the goal is to help close deals!

---
name: brave-search
description: Web search and content extraction via Brave Search API. Use for searching documentation, facts, or any web content. Lightweight, no browser required.
---

# Brave Search

Web search and content extraction using the official Brave Search API. No browser required.

## Setup

Requires a Brave Search API account with a free subscription. A credit card is required to create the free subscription (you won't be charged).

1. Create an account at https://api-dashboard.search.brave.com/register
2. Create a "Free AI" subscription
3. Create an API key for the subscription
4. Add to your shell profile (`~/.profile` or `~/.zprofile` for zsh):
   ```bash
   export BRAVE_API_KEY="your-api-key-here"
   ```
5. Install dependencies (run once):
   ```bash
   cd {baseDir}
   npm install
   ```

## Search

```bash
{baseDir}/search.js "query"                         # Basic search (5 results)
{baseDir}/search.js "query" -n 10                   # More results (max 20)
{baseDir}/search.js "query" --content               # Include page content as markdown
{baseDir}/search.js "query" --freshness pw          # Results from last week
{baseDir}/search.js "query" --freshness 2024-01-01to2024-06-30  # Date range
{baseDir}/search.js "query" --country DE            # Results from Germany
{baseDir}/search.js "query" -n 3 --content          # Combined options
```

### Options

- `-n <num>` - Number of results (default: 5, max: 20)
- `--content` - Fetch and include page content as markdown
- `--country <code>` - Two-letter country code (default: US)
- `--freshness <period>` - Filter by time:
  - `pd` - Past day (24 hours)
  - `pw` - Past week
  - `pm` - Past month
  - `py` - Past year
  - `YYYY-MM-DDtoYYYY-MM-DD` - Custom date range

## Extract Page Content

```bash
{baseDir}/content.js https://example.com/article
```

Fetches a URL and extracts readable content as markdown.

## Output Format

```
--- Result 1 ---
Title: Page Title
Link: https://example.com/page
Age: 2 days ago
Snippet: Description from search results
Content: (if --content flag used)
  Markdown content extracted from the page...

--- Result 2 ---
...
```

## When to Use

- Searching for documentation or API references
- Looking up facts or current information
- Fetching content from specific URLs
- Any task requiring web search without interactive browsing

content.text:
# Bennett, Bennett & Trice, PLLC - Tax & Accounting Firm in Lubbock, TX

## Insightful answers and proactive solutions that deliver real value.

Bennett, Bennett & Trice is a West Texas firm that delivers extraordinary assurance, tax, and consulting services.

## Always attentive. Certainly calculated. But, never typical.

Our role lends itself to being calculated and often conservative. But we‚Äôre not your stereotypical accounting firm. We bring a unique and refreshing approach to our clients in West Texas. Welcome to better representation for the aspects of your business that deserve the attention, service, and solutions that make a difference.

### Assurance

Thorough tax and financial evaluation for advantageous clients.

### Tax Management

Personalized tax planning and preparation decisions through strategy and expertise.

### Advisory

Relationship-driven services that add long-term value and peace of mind.

### Consulting

Objective analysis and sound guidance for controlling costs and increasing efficiency.

![](https://www.bbtcpa.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/sandevil-sandh-7F3Fc_0yz_Y-unsplash-1.jpg)

![BB&T Exterior](https://www.bbtcpa.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/bennett-bennett-trice-office-exterior-small.jpg)

## West Texas professionals with broad perspective.

Bennett Bennett & Trice, PLLC is a full-service accounting firm serving clients throughout West Texas. We are dedicated to providing our clients with professional, personalized services and guidance in a wide range of financial and business needs.

#### [Learn More About Us](https://www.bbtcpa.com/about-us/)

## Improving financial performance. For every client.

A part of every individual or company‚Äôs financial health and performance is how well prepared and you navigate taxes. We offer the service and approach to do this better than our competition.

#### [Explore Our Services](https://www.bbtcpa.com/services/)

![](https://www.bbtcpa.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/09/sandevil-sandh-7F3Fc_0yz_Y-unsplash-1.jpg)

![Lubbock CPA Firm](https://www.bbtcpa.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/cpa-lubbock-texas.jpg)

## Experience, foresight, strategy and execution.

## Our services

Bennett Bennett & Trice, PLLC provides a wide range of services to individuals and businesses in a variety of industries. At Bennett Bennett & Trice, PLLC, we strive to meet each client‚Äôs specific needs in planning for the future and achieving their goals in an ever-changing financial and regulatory environment.

Our professional services include:

![](https://www.bbtcpa.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/bryan-bennett-lifestyle-portrait.jpg)

![Bennett, Bennett & Trice Team](https://www.bbtcpa.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/bbt-cpa-team.jpg)

#### Meaningful relationships start with great questions that deserve real answers.

## Let's start a conversation that will be beneficial to you or your business.

# Bloomfield, CT Accounting Firm | Home Page

**Courtney, Fink & Forbes, LLP** 
719 Cottage Grove Road, Bloomfield, CT 06002

- Full-service accounting firm

- Serves many cities and industries
- 5 stars (2 reviews)

**Bennett & Company CPAs** (actually Bennett, Bennett & Trice, PLLC):
- Website shows they're based in Lubbock, TX (West Texas)
- Has a modern, professional website with great content
- BUT they're NOT in the Hartford, CT area (06002 zip code)
- This seems like a data error - wrong business
- 5 stars (2 reviews)

1. **Taxes First LLC** - NO WEBSITE AT ALL - HIGHEST PRIORITY! This is a perfect lead for website development. They have good reviews (4.7 stars, 14 reviews) which means they have an active client base but no web presence.

2. **Courtney, Fink & Forbes** - Has a very basic/outdated website that needs serious improvement. Good opportunity for website redesign and potentially AI automation for client scheduling/intake.

3. **Bennett & Company** - This appears to be a data error (Texas firm, not Connecticut). Their website is already professional. This is the LOWEST priority or potentially should be excluded.

arguments.content:
# üéØ Lead Analysis Report - February 21, 2026

## Executive Summary

Analyzed 3 accounting firms in the Bloomfield, CT area (zip code 06002). **One critical finding:** Taxes First LLC has NO WEBSITE despite strong reviews - this is a high-conversion opportunity. 

**Top Priority:** Taxes First LLC (Website Development)  
**Secondary:** Courtney, Fink & Forbes (Website Redesign)  
**Low Priority:** Bennett & Company (Data Error - Texas firm with existing modern site)

---

## üèÜ PRIORITY RANKING

### #1 - Taxes First LLC ‚≠ê TOP PICK
**Conversion Score: 9/10**

**Business Details:**
- **Location:** 756 Park Avenue, Bloomfield, CT 06002
- **Phone:** +1 860-242-4330
- **Principal:** Clyde Triumph, CPA
- **Rating:** 4.7 stars (14 reviews)
- **Current Website:** NONE (listed URL is a random blog post, not their site)

**Why They'll Convert:**
- ‚úÖ **NO WEBSITE** - Critical gap in their business infrastructure
- ‚úÖ **Strong reputation** (4.7 stars, 14 reviews) = active client base
- ‚úÖ **Tax season approaching** - Peak time for accounting services
- ‚úÖ **Local visibility** - Listed in directories but no web presence
- ‚úÖ **Competing firms have websites** - They're at a disadvantage

**Pain Points to Highlight:**
1. "Losing clients to competitors who are easier to find online"
2. "Missing out on new clients who search for 'tax prep near me'"
3. "Spending time answering the same questions - could be automated with FAQs"
4. "Can't showcase services 24/7 when phone is closed"

**Recommended Services:**
- **Primary:** Professional Website ($2,500-4,000)
  - Services page highlighting tax prep, business accounting
  - Contact form for new client inquiries
  - FAQ section to reduce phone calls
  - Mobile-responsive design
- **Secondary:** AI Chatbot for client intake ($500-1,000)
- **Future:** Social media presence for tax tips/updates

**Best Contact Time:** 
- **Tuesday-Thursday, 10am-12pm or 2pm-4pm** (avoid Monday chaos and Friday early closings)
- **Avoid:** January-April 15 (tax season crunch)

**Opening Script (Phone):**
```
"Hi, this is [Your Name] with [Your Company]. I was researching local CPA firms 
in Bloomfield and noticed that Taxes 1st has fantastic reviews - 4.7 stars with 
14 reviews is impressive! 

I also noticed you don't have a website yet. With tax season coming up and more 
people searching online for 'tax prep near me,' I wanted to reach out about how 
a professional website could help you capture those searches and make it easier 
for new clients to find and contact you.

Is Mr. Triumph available for a quick conversation about this?"
```

**Email Subject:** "Missing 70% of new clients? (Taxes 1st - Bloomfield)"

---

### #2 - Courtney, Fink & Forbes LLP
**Conversion Score: 6/10**

**Business Details:**
- **Location:** 719 Cottage Grove Road, Bloomfield, CT 06002
- **Phone:** +1 860-242-9400
- **Email:** cff.cpa@cffcpa.com
- **Rating:** 5 stars (2 reviews)
- **Current Website:** https://www.cffcpa.com/ (VERY basic - just contact info)

**Why They'll Convert:**
- ‚úÖ **Outdated website** - No content, no services listed, just contact info
- ‚úÖ **Full-service firm** - Multiple industries/services per CT CPA directory
- ‚úÖ **Established firm** - Been around long enough to have older website
- ‚ö†Ô∏è **Only 2 reviews** - May not prioritize marketing spend

**Pain Points to Highlight:**
1. "Your website doesn't tell potential clients what you do"
2. "Competitors have modern sites that rank higher in Google"
3. "You're a full-service firm but your site doesn't show it"
4. "Missing opportunity to pre-qualify clients online"

**Recommended Services:**
- **Primary:** Website Redesign ($3,000-5,000)
  - Services showcase (taxation, business accounting, financial planning)
  - Industry expertise pages (they serve 16+ industries!)
  - Team/about page to build trust
  - Client portal integration
- **Secondary:** AI Automation - Appointment scheduling bot
- **Future:** Social media content calendar for tax tips

**Best Contact Time:** 
- **Wednesday-Thursday, 10am-3pm** (mid-week, outside morning rush)

**Opening Script (Phone):**
```
"Hi, this is [Your Name] with [Your Company]. I came across Courtney, Fink & 
Forbes while researching local CPA firms, and I noticed something interesting.

You're listed as a full-service firm serving over 16 different industries, but 
when I visit your website, none of that information is there - just contact info. 

Many potential clients are likely leaving your site and going to competitors who 
better showcase their expertise. I specialize in website redesigns for professional 
services firms, and I'd love to show you what we could do to better represent 
your firm online.

Would you have 15 minutes this week for a quick call?"
```

**Email Subject:** "Your website isn't showing your full expertise (CFF LLP)"

---

### #3 - Bennett & Company CPAs ‚ö†Ô∏è DATA ERROR
**Conversion Score: 2/10**

**Business Details:**
- **Listed Phone:** +1 860-243-3333
- **Listed Website:** https://www.bbtcpa.com/
- **Rating:** 5 stars (2 reviews)
- **ACTUAL Location:** Lubbock, TX (West Texas)

**‚ö†Ô∏è RED FLAGS:**
- Website belongs to "Bennett, Bennett & Trice, PLLC" in Lubbock, Texas
- NOT located in Hartford/Bloomfield, CT area
- Already has a modern, professional website with excellent content
- Likely a data error in the lead list (wrong business matched to phone number)

**Why Low Priority:**
- ‚ùå **Wrong geographic market** - They're 2,000+ miles away
- ‚ùå **Already has excellent website** - Modern design, good content, professional photos
- ‚ùå **No local connection** - Not relevant to 06002 zip code search
- ‚ùå **Established firm** - Not likely to need our services

**Recommendation:** 
**Do NOT contact unless you can verify a Connecticut location.** This appears to be a data matching error. The phone number may belong to a different Bennett & Company in CT, but the website definitely doesn't match.

---

## üìû CONTACT STRATEGY FOR TODAY

### Priority Order:
1. **Call Taxes First LLC** (860-242-4330) - Highest conversion potential
2. **Email Courtney, Fink & Forbes** (cff.cpa@cffcpa.com) - Secondary opportunity
3. **Skip Bennett & Company** - Data error, wrong market

### Time of Day Strategy:
- **10:00 AM - 12:00 PM:** Best time to call accounting firms (after morning email check, before lunch)
- **2:00 PM - 4:00 PM:** Secondary window (after lunch, before end-of-day rush)
- **Avoid:** Before 9am (too early), after 4pm (winding down), Fridays (people check out early)

### Follow-Up Plan:
- **Day 1:** Initial call/email
- **Day 3:** Follow-up email with case studies
- **Day 7:** Final follow-up call
- **After:** Add to nurture campaign for quarterly check-ins

---

## üí° TALKING POINTS BY SERVICE TYPE

### Website Development (Taxes First LLC):
- "You're invisible to 70% of potential clients who search online first"
- "Your competitors with websites are capturing searches you're missing"
- "A website works 24/7 - answering questions even when you're with clients"
- "Cost: $2,500-4,000 one-time, $50/month hosting. ROI: Just 2 new clients covers the entire cost"

### Website Redesign (Courtney, Fink & Forbes):
- "Your current site doesn't represent your expertise"
- "Google ranks modern, content-rich sites higher - you're losing search traffic"
- "Potential clients can't tell if you serve their industry"
- "Modern websites convert visitors 300% better than outdated ones"

### AI Automation (Both):
- "Stop answering the same 10 questions on every phone call"
- "AI chatbot can pre-qualify clients and schedule consultations automatically"
- "Client intake forms can be automated - save 2-3 hours per week"
- "During tax season, automation handles the surge without hiring temporary staff"

---

## üö® OBJECTION HANDLING

### "We're too busy during tax season"
**Response:** "That's exactly why we should start now. We'll launch before your busy season, so your website is working FOR you when you're slammed with clients. Plus, a website reduces interruptions by answering common questions automatically."

### "We get referrals, we don't need a website"
**Response:** "Referrals are great! But even referred clients Google you first. What impression does no website (or an outdated site) give? A modern site validates the referral and makes them confident in choosing you."

### "How much does this cost?"
**Response:** "For a professional website, we're looking at $2,500-4,000 one-time, plus $50-100/month for hosting and maintenance. If you land just 2 new clients from your website, it pays for itself. Most firms see 10-15 new inquiries in the first year."

### "I'll think about it"
**Response:** "Absolutely! While you're thinking, I can send you a quick proposal showing exactly what we'd include and some examples of sites we've built for other accounting firms. Would that be helpful? I can have it to you by end of day."

---

## üìä PROJECTED CONVERSION RATES

Based on analysis:

| Lead | Likelihood to Respond | Likelihood to Close | Timeline to Decision |
|------|----------------------|-------------------|---------------------|
| Taxes First LLC | 80% | 60% | 2-4 weeks |
| Courtney, Fink & Forbes | 50% | 30% | 4-6 weeks |
| Bennett & Company | 10% | 5% | N/A (wrong market) |

**Expected Outcome:** 
- 1-2 qualified meetings scheduled
- 1 project closed within 30 days (most likely Taxes First LLC)
- Total revenue potential: $2,500-6,000

---

## üéØ SUCCESS METRICS TO TRACK

- [ ] Initial contact made (phone/email)
- [ ] Response received
- [ ] Meeting/demo scheduled
- [ ] Proposal sent
- [ ] Follow-up completed
- [ ] Deal closed

**Note:** Track objections and responses for future lead outreach optimization.

- **NO WEBSITE AT ALL** - This is your golden opportunity!

**Why they'll convert:** They're losing clients to competitors who show up in online searches. With tax season approaching, timing is perfect. Just 2 new clients from a website covers the entire cost.

---

### **Secondary Opportunity: Courtney, Fink & Forbes LLP (Score: 6/10)**
- Has website but it's **extremely basic** (just contact info, no services listed)
- Full-service firm serving 16+ industries but website doesn't show it
- Phone: 860-242-9400 / Email: cff.cpa@cffcpa.com
- Website: https://www.cffcpa.com/
- **Email approach recommended** - less aggressive than cold call

---

### **Skip This One: Bennett & Company (Score: 2/10)** ‚ö†Ô∏è
- **Data error** - Website belongs to a Lubbock, Texas firm (2,000 miles away)
- Already has professional, modern website
- Not relevant to Connecticut market
- **Do not waste time contacting**

---

## üìã Files Created

1. **LEAD_ANALYSIS.md** - Comprehensive analysis with:
   - Priority rankings with detailed reasoning
   - Phone scripts and email templates
   - Objection handling strategies
   - Best contact times
   - Service recommendations and pricing

2. **EMAIL_TO_SEND.md** - Professional HTML email with:
   - Clean, muted color scheme (slate/gray/blue accents)

   - Clickable phone numbers and links

3. **TELEGRAM_MESSAGE.md** - Concise summary (425 chars):
   - Top 3 picks with scores
   - One-line reasons
   - Clear action item

---

## üí° Today's Action Plan

**10:00 AM** - Call Taxes First LLC (860-242-4330)
- Ask for Clyde Triumph
